entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Drizzle or flurries changing to flurries this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:23 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:23 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
